description.en:
- HeartBeat Mail  
Uehara has always liked her classmate Kaji, who sits behind her, but cannot find the strength to talk to him. One day, Kaji left his phone on his desk so she decided to leave a note with her mail address on it. Soon, they started mailing each other; but what will come out of it?  
  
- 7Kiss  
Asano is transferring soon. However, 7 days before she does, she sees Andou-sensei shoveling and she went up to him and kissed him, using her cellphone to take a picture of the scene! Using the picture, she blackmailed Andou-sensei into agreeing to kiss her every morning for seven days till the last day before she transfers…  
  
- Love Lover (Part 2 is called Love Honey)  
Due to Shinji and Misaki’s parents remarrying, Shinji now becomes Misaki’s younger stepbrother. But that isn’t the only thing, Shinji and Misaki are also a couple, with their parents support! One day, when they come home from school, they find out that their parents have won a prize for a trip! What will happen on that trip?! And what will Misaki’s insecurity lead to?!  
  
- Ojousama no Okiniiri (Ojousama’s Favourite)  
Ayaka is the daughter of a rich family and the madonna of her school – beautiful, intelligent, and graceful, she’s the perfect modern day princess. Ever since she was small, she has always been the target of kidnapping, which is why her father hired Masaki, a boy the same age as Ayaka, to be her bodyguard. With such a perfect bodyguard who’s good at everything he does, Ayaka feels pressured to become perfect as well. And then one day, her father informs her that she’s going to get married…
